events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund case due to receiving the incorrect item.
Assigning case to refund specialist team to handle the request and initiate the refund process.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll be happy to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item I received instead.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and for processing the refund. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund process is now complete. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now as the refund has been successfully processed and no further assistance is required.
